title: Motor Skill Acquisition Strategies Using Ecological Dynamics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learners study motor skill acquisition theories in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment and perform tasks for real-life application.

learning_goals: Explain core principles of the ecological dynamics framework (e.g., person-environment interaction, flexibility)
Design and apply adaptive training strategies in the motor skill acquisition process
Demonstrate the process of improving motor skills through video self-analysis and peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
